name: Workspace (behzad-robot)
description:
Ludum dare 43 Entry.

Unfortunately i  couldn't implement happiness/hunger mechanic as i wanted to (no time and energy) but here's the output anyways.
This time i wanted to focus on working with new unity features like cine-machine / tilemap / etc ,also wanted to mess around with particle system cos that was and i'd say still is a unknown area to me.. So I chose sth quite classic and standard for game play.
